TransitDb.About: This section describes all the settings regarding the TransitDB
TransitDb.About:Name: A human readable name for this database. Used for debugging only
TransitDb.Name: NMBS/SNCB
TransitDb.About:Datasource: The datasource contains the URI's where the locations and connections can be found
TransitDb.About:Cache: If the 'cache'-file exists, the transitDB will be initially loaded from there. The DB will be updated on disk every now and then.
TransitDb.About:CacheUpdateEvery: How often the cache should be updated

ReloadPolicy.About: This section indicates the loading policies of new data. It consists of multiple time windows, relative with respect to the current moment. It describes what data should be in memory at all times (e.g: everything from today, the coming week and yesterday).
